enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The fifteenth session of the SBI met in four Plenary meetings chaired by John Ashe (Antigua and Barbuda), and adopted its agenda (FCCC/SBI/2001/10) at its first meeting.
Delegates elected Daniela Stoytcheva (Bulgaria) as SBI Vice-Chair and Emily Ojoo-Massawa (Kenya) as SBI Rapporteur.
The SBI referred several items to contact groups and informal consultations, as well as to the COP.
